DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness GW406381 ( COX-2 inhibitor ) treat sign symptom dental pain follow third molar tooth extraction .
DOC.brief_title: Dental Pain ( Following Third Molar Tooth Extraction ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: A Pivotal Phase III , Single Center , Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled , Parallel Group Dose-Ranging Study Investigate Efficacy Safety Single Oral Doses 10mg , 25mg , 50mg , 70mg GW406381 550mg Naproxen Sodium Subjects With Pain Following Third Molar Tooth Extraction
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Scheduled outpatient surgical removal least two third molar teeth . Exclusion criterion : Subjects achieve moderate severe pain . Subjects use acceptable contraception . Additional medical criterion assess investigator .
